mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from diningroom where productName like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' or cate like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
select nvl(count(*),0) from diningroom where cateEn=#{cateEn} and productName like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
select * from diningroom where cateEn=#{cateEn} order by imageIndex asc
select IMAGEINDEX,PRODUCTNAME,CATE,CATEEN,to_char(price, '999,999,999') as price,SAVEFILENAME from diningroom where imageIndex=#{imageIndex} and cateEn=#{cateEn}

select IMAGEINDEX,PRODUCTNAME,CATE,CATEEN,to_char(price, '999,999,999') as price,SAVEFILENAME from livingroom union all select IMAGEINDEX,PRODUCTNAME,CATE,CATEEN,to_char(price, '999,999,999') as price,SAVEFILENAME from diningroom union all select IMAGEINDEX,PRODUCTNAME,CATE,CATEEN,to_char(price, '999,999,999') as price,SAVEFILENAME from bedroom union all select IMAGEINDEX,PRODUCTNAME,CATE,CATEEN,to_char(price, '999,999,999') as price,SAVEFILENAME from deco;
